Tunis is located in Tunisia. It is the capital and largest city of the country. Algum or Tunis, as it was known in the Roman era, is a coastal city of North Africa, and is the historical seat of the Carthaginians. It was later ruled by the Byzantine, Arabs, and the Ottoman Turks, and today is a major city of the Maghreb region.
